snippet.title: Surgeon Simulator 2: Access All Areas - Xbox Announce
snippet.description:
Scalpels at the ready! We’re bringing surgery to the masses, with Surgeon Simulator 2: Access All Areas launching on September 2nd 2021 across Steam, Windows Store on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One. 

This ultimate edition of Surgeon Simulator’s fully-fleshed out sequel will launch with a year’s worth of updates and brand-new features; including more animated characters.

 Milo, Penny, Heather and Kamal have never looked this good!

Scrub in solo or form your surgical dream team with up to four friends this September, on console OR PC!

Wishlist Surgeon Simulator 2: Access All Areas on Steam here: 

bossa.games/wishlistSS2
